title: Installation issue: intel-oneapi-compilers
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install intel-oneapi-compilers
==> Error: There are no valid versions for intel-oneapi-compilers that match ':'
```
Missing versions in package info: 

```console
spack info intel-oneapi-compilers 
Package:   intel-oneapi-compilers

Description:
    Intel OneAPI compilers Provides Classic and Beta compilers for: Fortran,
    C, C++

Homepage: https://software.intel.com/content/www/us/en/develop/tools/oneapi.html

Maintainers: @rscohn2 @danvev

Tags: 
    None

Preferred version:  
    None

Safe versions:  
    None

Variants:
    None

Installation Phases:
    install

Build Dependencies:
    patchelf

Link Dependencies:
    None

Run Dependencies:
    None

Virtual Packages: 
    None

```
If I try to force the version seen in package file.

```console

spack install intel-oneapi-compilers@2021.2.0 
==> Warning: Missing a source id for intel-oneapi-compilers@2021.2.0
==> Installing patchelf-0.12-tt4sillt7tu7vc5mrk4dxdm44avuvf5o
==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable certificate verification.
==> No binary for patchelf-0.12-tt4sillt7tu7vc5mrk4dxdm44avuvf5o found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /tmp/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/69/699a31cf52211cf5ad6e35a8801eb637bc7f3c43117140426400d67b7babd792.tar.bz2
==> Using cached archive: /tmp/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/a1/a155f233b228f02d7886e304cb13898d93801b52f351e098c2cc0719697ec9d0
==> Applied patch https://github.com/NixOS/patchelf/pull/230.patch
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'build'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'install'
==> patchelf: Successfully installed patchelf-0.12-tt4sillt7tu7vc5mrk4dxdm44avuvf5o
  Fetch: 0.00s.  Build: 6.58s.  Total: 6.59s.
[+] /tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-4.8.5/patchelf-0.12-tt4sillt7tu7vc5mrk4dxdm44avuvf5o
==> Error: Can't extrapolate a URL for version 2021.2.0 because package intel-oneapi-compilers defines no URLs

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3016-1fd1f1c
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original


<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

I have tested the build on my laptop (Ubuntu 20 without problems! 
```
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3016-1fd1f1c93f
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```


<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

@danvev @rscohn2


### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
